title: Studio Available Now! Schedule Your Future Home Tour!
posting_body: The Field’s latest addition Gideon, features a a collection of luxury living spaces revealing gorgeous interiors including studio, one, two and three-bedroom designs.
With 213 units, Gideon provides a small community charm, with the luxury amenities signature to The Fields.
Residents will enjoy a wellness-inspired rooftop complete with fitness center, pool, spa, and kombucha on tap.,The
Field’s latest addition Gideon, features a a collection of luxury living spaces revealing gorgeous interiors including studio, one, two and three-bedroom designs.
With 213 units, Gideon provides a small community charm, with the luxury amenities signature to The Fields.
Residents will enjoy a wellness-inspired rooftop complete with fitness center, pool, spa, and kombucha on tap.
,Stay up to date on Gideon, The Field’s newest luxury apartment home community.

Receive information about leasing, hard hat tours, specials, and more!,While the other communities of The Fields pay homage to accomplishments in modern science, Gideon is a celebration of some of the earliest discoveries in the life sciences—named for Gideon Mantell, the British paleontologist who discovered four of the five generations of dinosaurs known during this time.
As a tribute to the community’s namesake, original works of art exuding a modern-yet-organic sensibility will enhance nearly every aspect of the living experience.
Want to learn more about making Gideon you future home?

Contact us or join our mailing list and we will make to sure to keep you up to date with the latest updates and news!,While the other communities of The Fields pay homage to accomplishments in modern science, Gideon is a celebration of some of the earliest discoveries in the life sciences—named for Gideon Mantell, the British paleontologist who discovered four of the five generations of dinosaurs known during this time.
